v1.18.0.description: fixes issue with suggestion positioning getting reset by parent components

v1.15.0.description: fixes WCAG 2.0 AA accessibility issues regarding missing alt tags

v1.14.0.description: fixes products with white on transparent PNGs not showing in products section

v1.13.0.description: updates all buttons below content-placement-items to be vertically aligned

v1.11.0.description: updates to use aria-owns, aria-activedescendant, aria-live, the role combobox and adds tabbing behavior to collapse dropdown

v1.9.0.description: fixes an issue where position was spelled wrong
adds the product type for showing products in results
